Input-addon

Use the input add-on component in combination with the input group component. This combination creates an input field that provides the user with extra information on the (format of the) content that needs to be filled in, e.g. the currency, date or time format, etc. Typically, the input add-on takes the form of a clickable icon that you can link to a datepicker, timepicker, map service, etc.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-input-addon

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-input-addon

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-input-addon/src/scss/input-addon";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Input add-on informative

This input add-on is purely informative. Use it to clarify an expected input format in a form element. The add-on can be an icon, a symbol or a word.

€ 

      <p class="vl-input-addon js-vl-tooltip"
    data-vl-tooltip-content="Euro">
    €
  </p>

Input add-on with a location icon

This element adds a location icon to a form element. Link the icon to a map service to help the user select a location.

      <button class="vl-input-addon js-vl-tooltip"
          type="button"
          data-vl-tooltip-content="Locatie kiezen"
          data-vl-tooltip-accessibility="none">
    <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-location" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Locatie kiezen</span>
  </button>

Input add-on with a calendar icon

This element adds a calendar icon to a form element. Link the icon to a datepicker to help the user select a date.

      <button class="vl-input-addon js-vl-tooltip"
          type="button"
          data-vl-tooltip-content="Datum kiezen"
          data-vl-tooltip-accessibility="none">
    <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Datum kiezen</span>
  </button>

Input add-on with a clock icon

This element adds a clock icon to a form element. Link the icon to a timepicker to help the user select a time.

      <button class="vl-input-addon js-vl-tooltip"
          type="button"
          data-vl-tooltip-content="Tijdstip kiezen"
          data-vl-tooltip-accessibility="none">
    <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-clock" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Tijdstip kiezen</span>
  </button>

Input add-on with an address book icon

This element adds an address book icon to a form element. Link the icon to an address book to help the user select a contact.

      <button class="vl-input-addon js-vl-tooltip"
          type="button"
          data-vl-tooltip-content="Contactpersoon kiezen"
          data-vl-tooltip-accessibility="none">
    <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-addressbook" aria-hidden="true"></i>
    <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Contactpersoon kiezen</span>
  </button>

Accessibility

Use the input add-on component with caution. Icons without a label can be confusing and can add cognitive strain. Icons combined with a text label are always clearer.
